column4: when I run emacs, it quits with Undefined color: "black". I think this has to do with my rgb database (which exists in the RGBPath) being rgb.txt when xgl expects rgb.dir and rgb.pag (dbm files). any ideas?
that's an X and/or emacs question; you have better odds of finding an answer on other channels.
it's been several years since I mucked with that stuff.
it's not irrelevant, it's just (as I said) that the odds of finding someone here who knows the answer are low
